TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IReadOnlySessionState implements class System.Web.SessionState.IRequiresSessionState

summary.span: 指定目標 HTTP 處理常式只需要工作階段狀態值的讀取權限。

span.span: Specifies that the target HTTP handler requires only read access to session-state values.

summary.span: 這是沒有方法的標記介面。

span.span: This is a marker interface and has no methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作自訂處理常式來識別您的處理常式必須僅為工作階段狀態的值的讀取權限中的介面。Implement the interface in your custom handler to identify that your handler requires only read access to session-state values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會檢查目前的 HTTP屬性來判斷是否需要只可讀取工作階段狀態值。The following code example examines the current HTTP property to determine whether it requires only read access to session-state values. [!code-csharp[HttpSessionState#31](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpSessionState/CS/snippetscs.aspx#31)] [!code-vb[HttpSessionState#31](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpSessionState/VB/snippetsvb.aspx#31)]
